verse.verse_0: In the name of God, the Gracious, the Merciful.
verse.verse_2: But what will let you know what at-Tariq is?
verse.verse_4: There is no soul without a Protector over it.
verse.verse_5: Let man consider what he was created from.
verse.verse_6: He was created from gushing liquid.
verse.verse_7: Issuing from between the backbone and the breastbones.
verse.verse_8: He is certainly able to return him.
verse.verse_9: On the Day when the secrets are disclosed.
verse.verse_10: He will have no strength, and no supporter.
verse.verse_12: And the earth that cracks open.
verse.verse_17: Therefore, give the blasphemers respite, a brief respite.
